name: Forest and Chicken
description:
Gluttony is hungry and the forest is full of yummy, yummy food!

Make a stew for your pet chicken from the riches of the forest including berries, leeks, and ROOT vegetables!

Made for the Global Game Jam of 2023

Controls:

W and D or Left and Right arrow keys to move.

Space to interact.

Escape to quit.

Interactables:

Gluttony the Chicken

Stew

Bed

Various Forest Delights

Doors
